publicationStmt.publisher: Schenker Documents Online in association with the Centre for Computing in the Humanities

sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Ordinary member of the Gesellschaft der Musikfreunde in Vienna. In a list of the board of directors and administrative staff of the Gesellschaft, Krause is the last-named in 1912 as a Chancellery official.

div.head: Krause and Schenker
div.p: Krause was tangentially involved in a dispute between Schenker and Carl Lafite, the General Secretary of the Gesellschaft, in 1912: he is a signatory to OJ 11/22, [2] (June 12), his name appears as an annotation on GdM Exh. 332, [4] (September 20), and he is mentioned in WSLB 137 (September 24).

listBibl.bibl: Richard von Perger & Robert Hirschfeld, Geschichte der K. k. Gesellschaft der Musikfreunde in Wien, 2 vols (Vienna: Gesellschaft der Musikfreunde in Wien, 1912), vol. 1, p. 278
